A columnar in-memory analytics layer designed to accelerate big data.

33 namespace py {
34 
35 // A common interface to a Python file-like object. Must acquire GIL before
36 // calling any methods
37 class ARROW_EXPORT PythonFile {
38  public:
39  explicit PythonFile(PyObject* file);
40  ~PythonFile();
41 
42  Status Close();
43  Status Seek(int64_t position, int whence);
44  Status Read(int64_t nbytes, PyObject** out);
45  Status Tell(int64_t* position);
46  Status Write(const uint8_t* data, int64_t nbytes);
47 
48  private:
49  PyObject* file_;
50 };
51 
52 class ARROW_EXPORT PyReadableFile : public io::RandomAccessFile {
53  public:
54  explicit PyReadableFile(PyObject* file);
55  virtual ~PyReadableFile();
56 
57  Status Close() override;
58 
59  Status Read(int64_t nbytes, int64_t* bytes_read, uint8_t* out) override;
60  Status Read(int64_t nbytes, std::shared_ptr<Buffer>* out) override;
61 
62  Status GetSize(int64_t* size) override;
63 
64  Status Seek(int64_t position) override;
65 
66  Status Tell(int64_t* position) override;
67 
68  bool supports_zero_copy() const override;
69 
70  private:
71  std::unique_ptr<PythonFile> file_;
72 };
73 
74 class ARROW_EXPORT PyOutputStream : public io::OutputStream {
75  public:
76  explicit PyOutputStream(PyObject* file);
77  virtual ~PyOutputStream();
78 
79  Status Close() override;
80  Status Tell(int64_t* position) override;
81  Status Write(const uint8_t* data, int64_t nbytes) override;
82 
83  private:
84  std::unique_ptr<PythonFile> file_;
85  int64_t position_;
86 };
87 
88 // A zero-copy reader backed by a PyBuffer object
89 class ARROW_EXPORT PyBytesReader : public io::BufferReader {
90  public:
91  explicit PyBytesReader(PyObject* obj);
92  virtual ~PyBytesReader();
93 };
